Malice/ Megatron Revived:

Malice started to rush after the etreating femme, again fighting to 
keep his emotions in check.

Megatron was on his way to check the mess hall for signs of Malice 
when he almost ran into a sobbing Blacknightmare.  He stood and let 
her walk to him, his hands falling on her shoulders.

"Blacknightmare, what troubles you?  Why this distress?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacknightmare:
> 
> The femme did a brief sob and said while tears started to fell 
> 
> "I suspected your unpredictable nature since you save me when we 
fight to destroy the cannon and watch how do you fight agains the 
femme that I suspect os your sister, but inspite of  I still love 
you"her tears fell and she tembled when she regained her self 
control again, said "But now that you said that I have keep 
distance, I will keep distance, 'acuse I don't think to remain in a 
place where I have no reason to be... and sooner I leave this 
place,  will be better for all...."
> 
> The femme started to walke quickly towards opposite exit, sobbing 
and crying in low voice.
